flawed_nl_solution:
He had 8/2=<<8/2=4>>4 left after giving some puppies away
He then keeps one so he sells 4-1=<<4-1=3>>3 puppies
That means he made 3*600=$<<3*600=1080>>1080
So his profit was 1080-300=$<<1080-300=780>>780
#### 780

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1800, not 1080. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
